messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

job not defined for the person oracle sent thursday re error employee hello thank you for your sorry for trouble but issue still persists could we have call can show you exactly scenario receive error or maybe below helpful please find below steps follow report save close go review submit following error message displayed close up click next button following error message displayed for monday could you please advise thank you sent error employee hello please be advised your job present could you please retry once more let know how goes thank you best regards analyst ext hub sent wednesday re error employee hi finds you well unfortunately seems problem persists please check out attached could you please advise thank you sent monday re error employee hello thank you for your have checked confirm receive mentioned error message anymore thank you sent error employee hello everyone please be advised we have amended she should longer encounter job title error please check let know if you still experience issues your side looking forward hearing you analyst ext hub sent friday error employee hi can you please help with below colleague cannot input her something probably set up for her fusion thanks manager sent friday re si cod care tab review submit par sa fie thanks

I should categorize it accordingly in JSON format.**Deciding on ticket categorization**

The user asked me to categorize it, so getting this right is important for addressing their issue effectively!{"category":"Access"}
